name: Blackrock Flux Core (Built-in)
desc: Blackrock hulls are built around semi-ejectable powerplants and capacitor arrays, favoring active removal of flux instead of passive dissipation. Doubles the ship's active flux vent rate.

name: Enhanced Ejector System
desc: Nearly universal on shadowyards fighters, this ejection system provides additional crew protection through strategically placed buffer plates and a somewhat improved auto-ejector, increasing crew survival rates by 66%%.

name: Biosphere
desc:
An onboard closed ecosystem used to grow assorted flora and fauna, and provide necessities for long-term journeys. Reduces externally-sourced supply consumption to near-zero.

Can only be installed on capital ships.

name: Cloning Vats
desc:
Installs a delicate system of sealed cellular vats used in fast-maturation human cloning. Produces green crew at regular intervals.

Can only be installed on capital ships.

name: Nanobot Fabricators
desc:
Allows for the remote instruction of nanoscale robots, used in an industrial-scale parts fabrication and assembly factory. Produces supplies at regular intervals.

Can only be installed on capital ships.

name: Logistical Drone Control
desc:
Provides mechanical assistance with near-range interfleet supply transfers, and eases the storage and organization requirements associated with large fleet logistics operations.

Can only be installed on capital ships.

name: Naeran Flux Shunts
desc: Ancient Naeran technology that provides all Nomad ships with a way to dissipate flux internally by converting it into multi-spectrum EM radiation. Required for basic functioning of Nomad weapon systems, and not compatible with modern ships or technology due to its outdated design.
